level.text: If DCHA determines that a vehicle is stolen, whether on DCHA Property or Public Property, the DCHA’s Office of Public Safety shall report the vehicle stolen on the requisite Metropolitan Police Department report form or DCHA staff shall notify the Metropolitan Police Department of the stolen vehicle.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2112, 2113 (February 27, 2004).
